en: Sherlock! How wonderful to see you!

fr: But, why are you here in French?

en: Why, I've come to see you, of course!
fr: Because I want to see you in French!

en: Ah yes, my hometown. Exactly how I remember it. {wi} I might as well stop by my old house and check up on things.
es: Ah, si, mi ciudad. Exacamente como recuerdo. {wi} Necesito visitar mi casa.
fr: Ah yes, Paris. French stuff. Gotta go home.

en: Oh my goodness! I'm all out of {color=green}ibuprofen{/color}! Where can I go to get more?
es: Ay dios mio! No tengo {color=green}ibuprofen{/color}! A donde puedo ir para comprar mas?
fr: I don't have French ibuprofen! Where can I get more in French?"

en: Thank goodness! I'm glad I can go to my local doctor for my medical needs!
Ok, I think this is the place... What did I need again?
es: Ok, creo que sea el pais. Cual necesito?
fr: Ok, this is the French doctors' office. What French medicine did I need?

en: Hmmm. I don't think that was it.
es: Hmmm. Pienso que no fue el correcto.
fr: Hmmm. That wasn't the right French medicine.
